ConfigurationGroup.title: Credit Card
ConfigurationGroup.description: Configuration Settings For The Credit Card Payment Module

INSTALLED.title: Installed Status
INSTALLED.description: Tells if the module is installed or not

STATUS.title: Enable Credit Card Module
STATUS.description: Do you want to accept credit card payments?

DISPLAY_ORDER.title: Display Order
DISPLAY_ORDER.description: Display Order. Lowest is displayed first.

ZONE.title: Payment Zone
ZONE.description: If a zone is selected, only enable this payment method for that zone.

ORDER_STATUS_ID.title: Set Order Status
ORDER_STATUS_ID.description: Set the status of orders made with this payment module to this value

CHECKOUT_METHOD.title: Accepted Checkout Method
CHECKOUT_METHOD.description: Allow this payment module to be used for (Rental membership signup, Normal checkout or Both )

VISIBLE.title: Payment method visible
VISIBLE.description: Where is this payment method visible: Admin, Catalog or Both )

MODULE_PAYMENT_CREDITCARD_CVV_ENABLED.title: Enable CVV code
MODULE_PAYMENT_CREDITCARD_CVV_ENABLED.description:
Do you want to require the CVV code?
*Storing the CVV code is not permitted by some merchants, please check with your merchant to see if it is.

MODULE_PAYMENT_CREDITCARD_EMAIL.title: Split Credit Card E-Mail Address
MODULE_PAYMENT_CREDITCARD_EMAIL.description: If an e-mail address is entered, the middle digits of the credit card number will be sent to the e-mail address (the outside digits are stored in the database with the middle digits censored)
